files.name: css
files.source:
<style>
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Comfortaa&family=Glory:wght@300&family=Handlee&family=Kaisei+HarunoUmi&family=Carattere&family=Raleway:wght@400&family=Satisfy&display=swap');
</style>

<!--font-family: 'Comfortaa', cursive;
font-family: 'Handlee', cursive;
font-family: 'Glory', sans-serif;
font-family: 'Kaisei HarunoUmi', serif;
font-family: 'Raleway', sans-serif;
font-family: 'Satisfy', cursive;
font-family: 'Carattere', cursive;-->

<style>

html {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body{
  font-size: 16px;
}

h1{
  background-color: rgba(255, 241, 0, 0.5);
  padding: 3rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  font-family: 'Carattere', cursive;
  font-size: 5rem;
  color: #FFF; 
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 3px 3px 5px #A349A3, -3px -3px 5px #A349A3, 3px -3px 5px #A349A3, -3px 3px 5px #A349A3;
}

h2{
  font-family: 'Glory', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  text-align: center;
}

h3{
  font-family: 'Glory', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-style: italic;
  font-weight: 600;
  padding-bottom: 1rem;
}

p{
  font-family: 'Raleway', sans-serif;
}

.row{
  display: table;
  margin: 0 auto; 
}

.addEquipo{
  background-color: #D1A4D1;
}

.delEquipo{
  background-color: #FFF880;
}

.addTecnica{
  background-color: #C68DC6;
}

.delTecnica{
  background-color: #FFF660;
}

.addBox{
  background-color: #BA77BA;
}

.delBox{
  background-color: #FFF440;
}

.addServicio{
  background-color: #AF60AF;
}

.delServicio{
  background-color: #FFF320;
}

.addSubservicio{
  background-color: #A349A3;
}

.delSubservicio{
  background-color: #FFF100;
}

.addEquipo, .delEquipo, .addBox, .delBox, .addServicio, .delServicio, .addTecnica, .delTecnica, .addSubservicio, .delSubservicio{
  font-family: 'Raleway', sans-serif;
  padding: 1rem 1rem;
  width: 250px;
  border: none;
}

.center{
  margin: 3rem 0;
}

.agregar{
  background-color: #fff;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #A349A3;
  font-family: 'Raleway', sans-serif;
  padding: 1rem 1rem;
  width: auto;
  border: 1px solid #A349A3;
}

img {
  max-width: 100%;
}

div .col {
  width: 40%;
  display: inline;
}

/* Smartphones (portrait & landscape) */
@media only screen 
and (min-device-width : 320px) 
and (max-device-width : 480px) {

  h1{
    font-size: 3rem;
    padding: 2rem;
  }

  h2{
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }

  h3{
    font-size: 1.2rem;
  }

  p{
    font-size: 1rem;
  }

  .addEquipo, .delEquipo, .addBox, .delBox, .addServicio, .delServicio, .addTecnica, .delTecnica, .addSubservicio, .delSubservicio{
    width: auto;
    padding: 1rem 1rem;
  }
}

.item-label{
  font-weight: 550;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #A349A3;
}

label {
  font-family: 'Raleway', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  color: #727375;
}

.col-1 {width: 8.33%;}
.col-2 {width: 16.66%;}
.col-3 {width: 25%;}
.col-4 {width: 33.33%;}
.col-5 {width: 41.66%;}
.col-6 {width: 50%;}
.col-7 {width: 58.33%;}
.col-8 {width: 66.66%;}
.col-9 {width: 75%;}
.col-10 {width: 83.33%;}
.col-11 {width: 91.66%;}
.col-12 {width: 100%;}

[class*="col-"] {
float: left;
padding: 15px;
}
.row::after {
content: "";
clear: both;
display: table;
}
.responsive {
width: 100%;
height: auto;
}

</style>

files.name: css2.html
files.source:
<!--link rel="stylesheet" href="https://ssl.gstatic.com/docs/script/css/add-ons.css"-->


<style>




/* The container */
.container {
  display: block;
  position: relative;
  margin-left:10px;
  padding-left: 50px;
  margin-bottom: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 3rem;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
  margin: 35px;
  position: center;
}

/* Hide the browser's default radio button */
.container input[type=radio]{
  position: absolute;
  opacity: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
  
}


/* Hide the browser's default radio button 
.container input {
  position: absolute;
  opacity: 1;
  cursor: pointer;
  
}*/



/* Create a custom radio button */
.checkmark {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0px;
  left: -12px;
  height: 50px;
  width: 50px;
  background-color: #eee;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

/* On mouse-over, add a grey background color */
.container:hover input ~ .checkmark {
  background-color: #ccc;
}

/* When the radio button is checked, add a blue background */
.container input:checked ~ .checkmark {
  background-color: #2196F3;
}

/* Create the indicator (the dot/circle - hidden when not checked) */
.checkmark:after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  display: none;
}

/* Show the indicator (dot/circle) when checked */
.container input:checked ~ .checkmark:after {
  display: block;
}

/* Style the indicator (dot/circle) */
.container .checkmark:after {
 	top: 16px;
	left: 16px;
	width: 16px;
	height: 16px;
	border-radius: 75%;
	background: white;
}

.container input[type=text]{
  /*width: 600px;*/


}



h1{
  background-color: rgba(255, 241, 0, 0.5);
  padding: 3rem;
  width: 100%;
  font-family: 'Handlee', cursive;
  font-size: 5rem;
  color: #FFF; 
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 3px 3px 5px #A349A3, -3px -3px 5px #A349A3, 3px -3px 5px #A349A3, -3px 3px 5px #A349A3;
}

h2{
  font-family: 'Glory', sans-serif;
  font-size: 2rem;
  text-align: center;
}

h3 {
  font-family: 'Glory', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-style: italic;
  font-weight: 600;
  padding-bottom: 1rem;
}

p, label{
  font-family: 'Glory', sans-serif;
  font-size: 2rem;
  text-align: left;
}

html {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

select  {
  border: black;
  color: black;
  padding: 16px 32px;
  text-decoration: none;
  margin: 10px 10px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 54px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  background-color: rgba(255, 241, 0, 0.5);
  height: 20%;
  width:80%;
  
}

*, *:before, *:after {
  box-sizing: inherit;
}

body {
  background-color: #f6c9f6;
}

img {
  max-width: 100%;
}


div .col{
  width: 40 %;
  display: inline;
}

input[type=button], input[type=submit], input[type=reset], input[type=datetime-local]{
  border: black;
  color: none;
  padding: 16px 32px;
  text-decoration: none;
  margin: 10px 10px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 54px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: 2px 3px 5px black;
  /*height: 20%;*/
  width:80%;
  position: center;
  
}



button {
  border: none;
  color: black;
  padding: 16px 32px;
  text-decoration: none;
  margin: 10px 10px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 54px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: 2px 3px 5px black;
  height: 20%;
  width:80%;
  
}

/*
input[type=text], input[type=number], type=[datetime]{
  border: none;
  color: black;
  padding: 16px 32px;
  text-decoration: none;
  margin: 10px 10px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 54px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  
  height: 20%;
  width:40%;
  
}*/


.agregar, .Agregar {
  background-color: #00CC00;
}

.eliminar, .Eliminar {
  background-color: #CC0000;
}

.volver, .Volver {
  background-color: #AAAAAA;
}



  </style>
